amendment.description: To ensure that future funding for health care for veterans takes into account changes in population and inflation.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1435 withdrawn in Senate.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Amendment SA 1435 proposed by Senator Stabenow. (consideration: CR S8801) To ensure that future funding for health care for veterans takes into account changes in population and inflation.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1435 proposed by Senator Stabenow.
